languages.text: "Я не обсуждаю приказы, ведьма, и без колебаний делаю то, что должно. Мне достаточно и того почета, что Вольный Торговец велел{mf||а} мне избрать маршала".

traits.locale_text: "Я не обсуждаю приказы, ведьма, и без колебаний делаю то, что должно. Мне достаточно и того почета, что Вольный Торговец велел/а мне избрать маршала".

languages.text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."
languages.original_text: "Я не обсуждаю приказы, ведьма, и без колебаний делаю то, что должно. Мне достаточно и того почета, что Вольный Торговец велел{mf||а} мне избрать маршала".

traits.locale_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."
"I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."
"I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."
"I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."
"I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."
"I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

languages.text: 「魔女よ、俺が受けた命令について議論するつもりはない。やるべきことを、ためらうことなく遂行するだけだ。ローグトレーダーから新たな将帥の選定を託されたこと、それ自体がすでに名誉なんだ」
languages.original_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

traits.locale_text: 「魔女よ、俺が受けた命令について議論するつもりはない。やるべきことを、ためらうことなく遂行するだけだ。ローグトレーダーから新たな将帥の選定を託されたこと、それ自体がすでに名誉なんだ」

languages.text: "Ich diskutiere meine Befehle nicht, Hexe. Ich tue, was nötig ist, ohne zu zögern. Es ist mir schon eine Ehre, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mir befohlen hat, den neuen Marschall zu erwählen."
languages.original_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

traits.locale_text: "Ich diskutiere meine Befehle nicht, Hexe. Ich tue, was nötig ist, ohne zu zögern. Es ist mir schon eine Ehre, dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} mir befohlen hat, den neuen Marschall zu erwählen."

languages.text: « Je ne discute pas mes ordres, sorcière. Je fais le nécessaire sans hésiter. C'est déjà pour moi un honneur que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} m'ait demandé de choisir le nouveau maréchal. »
languages.original_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne discute pas mes ordres, sorcière. Je fais le nécessaire sans hésiter. C'est déjà pour moi un honneur que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} m'ait demandé de choisir le nouveau maréchal. »

languages.text: «Yo no discuto mis órdenes, bruja; hago lo que debe hacerse sin vacilar. Para mí ya supone un honor que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente me encomendase elegir al nuevo mariscal».
languages.original_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

traits.locale_text: «Yo no discuto mis órdenes, bruja; hago lo que debe hacerse sin vacilar. Para mí ya supone un honor que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente me encomendase elegir al nuevo mariscal».

languages.text: “我不打算讨论我的命令，女巫，我只会做我必须要做的事情，没有任何犹豫。行商浪人命令我决定新任元帅的人选，我感到非常荣幸。”
languages.original_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

traits.locale_text: “我不打算讨论我的命令，女巫，我只会做我必须要做的事情，没有任何犹豫。行商浪人命令我决定新任元帅的人选，我感到非常荣幸。”

languages.text: "Ben emirlerimi izah etmem cadı. Gereken neyse gözümü kırpmam, yaparım. Hür Tacir, yeni Miralay'ı seçmek üzere beni görevlendirdi. Bu bile benim için büyük bir şereftir."
languages.original_text: "I do not discuss my orders, witch — I do what must be done without hesitation. I am already honoured that the Rogue Trader commanded me to choose the new Marshal."

traits.locale_text: "Ben, emirlerimi izah etmem cadı. Gereken neyse gözümü kırpmam, yaparım. Hür Tacir, yeni Miralay'ı seçmek üzere beni görevlendirdi. Bu bile benim için büyük bir şereftir."
